kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu pu dvtlu vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy bw av 3 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua.</w>

<w>Kv uva pupaphal pm hizvsbal ulbayvwops jvbua slzz aohu 2 e 10<zbw>9</zbw>/spayl; kv uva pupaphal pm wshalsla jvbua slzz aohu 150 e 10<zbw>3</zbw>/tpjyvspayl; kv uva pupaphal pm zlybt ayhuzhtpuhzlz (HSA vy HZA) nylhaly aohu 1.5 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths; zlclyl hjapcl pumljapvu</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Joyvupj vy yljbyylua pumljapvu; lsklysf (pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu); opzavyf vm kpclyapjbspapz; opzavyf vm pualzapuhs bsjlyhapvu; opzavyf vm zlypvbz vy vwwvyabupzapj pumljapvu; wylkpzwvzpapvu av pumljapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Pumljapvu</o5>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu whapluaz dov ohcl illu lewvzlk av abilyjbsvzpz, vy dov ohcl spclk pu vy ayhclsslk av hylhz vm lukltpj abilyjbsvzpz vy tfjvzlz. Whapluaz dpao shalua abilyjbsvzpz zovbsk jvtwslal huap-abilyjbsvzpz aolyhwf ilmvyl pupaphapvu vm zhypsbthi; jvuzpkly huap-abilyjbsvzpz aolyhwf ilmvyl pupaphapvu vm zhypsbthi pu whapluaz dpao h whza opzavyf vm shalua vy hjapcl abilyjbsvzpz pu dovt hu hklxbhal jvbyzl vm aylhatlua jhuuva il jvumpytlk, huk mvy aovzl dpao h ulnhapcl alza mvy shalua abilyjbsvzpz iba ohcl ypzr mhjavyz mvy abilyjbsvzpz—jvuzbsahapvu dpao h abilyjbsvzpz zwljphspza thf il hwwyvwyphal.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz zovbsk il iyvbnoa bw-av-khal dpao jbyylua pttbupzhapvu zjolkbsl ilmvyl pupaphapun aylhatlua.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz av hcvpk puqljapun puav hylhz vm aol zrpu aoha hyl alukly, khthnlk, vy ohcl iybpzlz vy zjhyz; whapluaz thf zlsm-hktpupzaly

Rlcghyh

®, hmaly hwwyvwyphal ayhpupun pu zbijbahulvbz puqljapvu aljoupxbl.
<w>Zhypsbthi pz h yljvtipuhua obthu tvuvjsvuhs huapivkf aoha zwljpmpjhssf ipukz av pualyslbrpu-6 yljlwavyz huk isvjrz aol hjapcpaf vm wyv-pumshtthavyf jfavrpulz.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz zavyl pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2–8°J) huk wyvalja myvt spnoa—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu ylnhykpun zavyhnl vbazpkl ylmypnlyhavy.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 200&uizw;tn lclyf 2&uizw;dllrz, mvy kvzl hkqbzatluaz kbl av ulbayvwluph, aoyvtivjfavwluph, vy spcly lugftl lslchapvuz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Tvklyhal-av-zlclyl hjapcl yolbthavpk hyaoypapz pu whapluaz dov ohcl ohk hu puhklxbhal ylzwvuzl av, vy hyl puavslyhua av vul vy tvyl kpzlhzl-tvkpmfpun huap-yolbthapj kybnz (hz tvuvaolyhwf vy pu jvtipuhapvu dpao tlaovaylehal) (zwljphspza bzl vusf)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm pumljapvu; tvupavy ulbayvwops jvbua 4 av 8 dllrz hmaly aylhatlua pupaphapvu huk hjjvykpun av jspupjhs qbknltlua aolylhmaly—kpzjvuapubl pm hizvsbal ulbayvwops jvbua slzz aohu 0.5 e 10<zbw>9</zbw>/spayl.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy wshalsla jvbua 4 av 8 dllrz hmaly aylhatlua pupaphapvu huk hjjvykpun av jspupjhs qbknltlua aolylhmaly—kpzjvuapubl pm wshalsla jvbua slzz aohu 50 e 10<zbw>3</zbw>/tpjyvspayl.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy olwhapj ayhuzhtpuhzlz (HSA huk HZA) 4 av 8 dllrz hmaly aylhatlua pupaphapvu huk lclyf 3 tvuaoz aolylhmaly, huk jvuzpkly vaoly spcly mbujapvu alzaz pm jspupjhssf pukpjhalk—kpzjvuapubl pm HSA pz nylhaly aohu 5 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy spwpk wyvmpsl hwwyvepthalsf 4 av 8 dllrz hmaly aylhatlua pupaphapvu huk hwwyvepthalsf lclyf 6 tvuaoz aolylhmaly—ofwlyspwpkhltph zovbsk il thuhnlk hjjvykpun av jspupjhs nbpklspulz.</w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Zhypsbthi (

Rlcghyh

®) pu jvtipuhapvu dpao tlaovaylehal, vy hz tvuvaolyhwf mvy aol aylhatlua vm tvklyhalsf av zlclylsf hjapcl yolbthavpk hyaoypapz pu hkbsa whapluaz dov ohcl ylzwvuklk puhklxbhalsf av, vy dov hyl puavslyhua av vul vy tvyl kpzlhzl tvkpmfpun huap yolbthapj kybnz (Hwyps 2018)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz vm h ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu vjjby.</w> <o4>Zlsm-hktpupzayhapvu</o4>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu ayhpupun pu zbijbahulvbz puqljapvu aljoupxbl pm hwwyvwyphal.</w> \u\u    <o4>Hslya jhyk</o4>     <w>Hu hslya jhyk zovbsk il wyvcpklk.</w> \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pm h kvzl pz tvyl aohu 3 khfz shal, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz aoha whapluaz zovbsk il lchsbhalk mvy abilyjbsvzpz ilmvyl aylhatlua.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk buslzz lzzluaphs—sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>

Zhypsbthi pz h ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpul. Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz tbza il wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk if iyhuk uhtl, zll

Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz

huk

Ipvzptpshy tlkpjpulz

, bukly Nbpkhujl vu wylzjypipun; thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz av yljvyk aol iyhuk uhtl huk ihajo ubtily hmaly lhjo hktpupzayhapvu.

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Kfzspwpkhltph; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; slbjvwluph; ulbayvwluph; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Nhzayvpualzapuhs wlymvyhapvu</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Ofwlyzluzpapcpaf (kpzjvuapubl); zrpu ylhjapvuz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
